sentences.english: Minister rushed about the camp praying and exhorting.
sentences.chinese: 牧師在營地到處奔走，一邊禱告，一邊勸戒。

sentences.english: Admonish your friends in private, praise them in public. (pron. )
sentences.chinese: 對朋友私下勸戒，公開表揚。

sentences.english: The ear that heareth the reproofs of life, shall abide in the midst of the wise.
sentences.chinese: 喜聽有益生命勸戒的人，必得列於智慧人的中間。

sentences.english: She had abandoned all attempts at remonstrance with Thomas.
sentences.chinese: 她已經放棄了一切勸戒托馬斯的嘗試。

sentences.english: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority.
sentences.chinese: 這些事你要講明，勸戒人，用各等權柄責備人。

sentences.english: She expostulated with her husband on his habit of smoking in bed.
sentences.chinese: 她勸戒丈夫改掉在牀上吸菸的習慣。

sentences.english: But ye have set at nought all my counsel, and would none of my reproof
sentences.chinese: 反輕棄我一切的勸戒，不肯受我的責備。

sentences.english: Admonish your friends in private, praise them in public.
sentences.chinese: 對朋友私下勸戒，公開表揚。
